title: Manage Underground Dewatering
description: An underground operator inspects and manages the pumps and sumps that keep their work area dry.

tasks.description: Perform a daily inspection of the local sump and pumps, checking for leaks or unusual noises.
Notice that the sump level is high and one of the two pumps is not running.
tasks.expected_outcome: The operator identifies a problem with one of the pumps.

tasks.description: Attempt to restart the pump. When it fails, create a high-priority work order for an electrician to troubleshoot the pump's motor.
tasks.expected_outcome: A corrective maintenance work order is created in the system for the failed pump.
